title.rendered: AND CO Launches Partnership with Fundbox

content.rendered:
We’ve got some exciting news for freelancers: we’ve officially launched our partnership with AND CO from Fiverr.

Since 2016, AND CO has been a top choice for freelancers looking to send proposals, send invoices, get paid, and track their time and tasks online. Since integrating with Fundbox, AND CO users can also apply for credit and get access to business funds, all within their dashboard.

Here’s how to use Fundbox inside of AND CO

When you’re logged in to your AND CO account, view any open invoice. You’ll see an option to “get paid early.” Choose that and sign up for Fundbox to apply for a revolving line of credit that you can use to keep growing your business, even if you’re waiting on client payments.

You can sign up in seconds, without leaving your invoicing workflow. Most customers get a decision in minutes. If approved, you can expect your funds deposited into your account as soon as the next business day.

Screenshot: Invoice view in the AND CO dashboard.

“We wanted to make business funds fast and easy to access for our freelancers,” says Leif Abraham, co-founder and CEO at AND CO from Fiverr. “We’re always looking for ways to help make running your business simpler and more efficient. Our integration partnership with Fundbox means you can apply for credit when you need it, without any of the paperwork.”

Want to learn more about Fundbox and AND CO? Get the details and apply here inside AND CO.
